timeline.bodyText: wouldn't it be better to just return null in this case also?
timeline.author: walec51

replies.bodyText:
sure, we could use null here. But what if you need to differ between null and empty?
was not sure and decided to keep empty type in place
replies.author: andre77

timeline.bodyText: Collections.EMPTY_LIST instead of new ArrayList<>() would be better
timeline.author: walec51

replies.bodyText: sure, @value is a good option here, but i simply wanted to be consistent to other classes in this package
replies.author: andre77
